# MEAD

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

MEAD performs estimation and inference on cell type proportions in deconvolving bulk RNA-seq data.

## Installation

You can install the package from [GitHub](https://github.com/DongyueXie/MEAD) with:

```{r,eval=FALSE}
install.packages('devtools')
devtools::install_github('DongyueXie/MEAD')
library(MEAD)
```

## Tutorial

See the [vignette](vignettes/MEAD.html) for an example.
